markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, desire and greed for perception of sights, perception of sounds, perception of smells, perception of tastes, perception of touches, or perception of thoughts is a corruption of the mind. …”

SN.27.7. Sañcetanāsutta (“Intention”)
